56D-d-09-13-87-RFP.Narrative: YARD CREW MEMBERS FOUND TWO CARS (D&H 278, LOAD, AND GATX 92017, LOAD) STANDING ON THE OUTBOUND ENGINE RUNNING TRACK ON NORTH END OF CLASSIFICATION YARD. IT WAS DETERMINED THAT THESE CARS HAD KICKED THE SKATE OFF OF NO.9 TRACK IN CLASSIFICATION YARD AND ROLLED OUT NORTH END OF TRACK INTO THE OUTBOUND ENGINE RUNNING TRACK. YARDMASTER INSTRUCTED CREW MEMBERS TO KICK CARS OFF RUNNING TRACK INTO NO.9TRACK. CREW KICKED CARS AS INSTRUCTED AND IN DOING SO CARS ROLLED BACK INTO NO.9 TRACK AND OUT THE SOUTH END OF THE TRACK INTO THE SIDE OF ACFX 78810 (EMPTY) AND NATX 14700 (EMPTY) WHICH WERE BEING HANDLED BY HUMP CREW INTO THE SOUTH END OF NO.10 TRACK AND FOULING THE SOUTH END OF NO.9 TRACK. THE IMPACT OF THE D&H AND GATX CARS COLLIDING WITH THE ACFX AND NATX CARS RESULTED IN WHEELS R & L, 3 & 4OF THE NATX CAR BEING DERAILED AND HEAVY DAMAGE TO THE NATX AND GATX CARS.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone
